entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
